translation.en: Something is coming. Something hungry for blood.
translation.ja: 何かが来る 血に飢えた何か

translation.en: A shadow grows on the wall behind you, swallowing you in darkness.
translation.ja: 背後の壁に影が伸び 皆を闇に飲み込む それが迫ってきた

translation.en: - It is almost here. - What is it?
translation.ja: それが迫ってきた 何が？

translation.en: What if it's the Demogorgon?
Oh, Jesus, we're so screwed if it's the Demogorgon.
translation.ja: だったら おしまいだ デモゴルゴンじゃない

translation.en: It's not the Demogorgon.
translation.ja: デモゴルゴンじゃない

translation.en: An army of troglodytes charge into the chamber!
translation.ja: トログロダイト軍が突入！

translation.en: - Troglodytes? - Told ya.
Wait a minute.
Did you hear that?
That... that sound?
That didn't come from the troglodytes. No, that... That came from something else.
translation.ja: トログロダイトじゃない 他に何かいる

translation.en: - The Demogorgon! -
- We're in deep shit. - Will, your action!
translation.ja: ヤバい ウィルの番だ

translation.en: - I don't know! - Fireball him!
translation.ja: ウィルの番だ 攻撃だ！

translation.en: I'd have to roll a 13 or higher!
Too risky. Cast a protection spell.
- Don't be a pussy. Fireball him! - Cast Protection.
translation.ja: ファイアボールだ 防御術だ

translation.en: The Demogorgon is tired of your silly human bickering!
It stomps towards you.
- Boom! - Fireball him!
- Another stomp, boom! - Cast Protection.
translation.ja: ファイアボール！ 防御術だ！

translation.en: - He roars in anger! -
translation.ja: ほえてる！ ファイアボール！

translation.en: - Fireball! -
- Oh, shit! - Where'd it go?
Where is it?  I don't know!
- Is it a 13? - I don't know!
Mike!  Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
- Mike! - Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
Mom, we're in the middle of a campaign!
You mean the end? Fifteen after.
- Mom, wait, just 20 more minutes! - It's a school night, Michael.
translation.ja: あと20分だけ 明日は学校でしょ 続きは来週になさい

translation.en: I just put Holly to bed. You can finish next weekend.
translation.ja: 明日は学校でしょ 続きは来週になさい

translation.en: - But that'll ruin the flow! - Michael--
I'm serious, Mom. The campaign took two weeks to plan.
translation.ja: ２週間かけて 物語を練ったんだ

translation.en: How was I supposed to know it was gonna take ten hours?
You've been playing for ten hours?
- Dad, don't you think that 20 more-- - I think you should listen to your mother.
translation.ja: パパ あと20分 ママの言うとおりだ

translation.en: - - Dang dumb piece of junk.
Oh, I got it!
- Does the seven count? - It was a seven?
translation.ja: でも７だ マイクに見せた？

translation.en: Did Mike see it? Then it doesn't count.
Yo, hey, guys.
- Does anyone want this? - No.
translation.ja: おい　残り食うか？ 要らない

translation.en: Yeah, he's cute.
Barb, no, I don't think so.
translation.ja: バーバラ そんなんじゃないの

translation.en: - Barb, you're not-- - Hey, Nancy.
There's a slice left if you want it.
translation.ja: ピザ 残ってるけど 食わない？

translation.en: - Sausage and pepperoni! - Hold on.
translation.ja: ピザ 残ってるけど 食わない？ 待って

translation.en: - There's something wrong with your sister. - What are you talking about?
translation.ja: お前の姉貴 何だ 何の話さ

translation.en: - She's got a stick up her butt. - Yeah.
translation.ja: 態度が悪い 最低男のスティーブが彼氏だ

translation.en: It's because she's been dating that douchebag, Steve Harrington.
translation.ja: 最低男のスティーブが彼氏だ

translation.en: Yeah, she's turning into a real jerk.
She's always been a real jerk.
Nuh- uh, she used to be cool. Like that time she dressed up as an elf for our Elder tree campaign.
translation.ja: 前の会戦では エルフの格好してくれたろ

translation.en: Four years ago!
Just saying.  Later.
- It was a seven. - Huh?
The roll, it was a seven.
The Demogorgon, it got me.
See you tomorrow.
Good night, ladies.  Kiss your mom 'night for me.
translation.ja: またな ママによろしく

translation.en: Race you back to my place? Winner gets a comic.
translation.ja: コミックを賭(か)けて競走だ

translation.en: - Any comic? - Yeah.
Hey! Hey!
translation.ja: おい！ スタートって言ってない！

translation.en: I didn't say go!
translation.ja: スタートって言ってない！

translation.en: Get back here!
I'm gonna kill you!
I'll take your X- Men 134!
Son of a bitch.
Mom?
- Jonathan? Mom? -
- Hello? Hello? -
And that's it for News Center this morning.
translation.ja: センターからは 以上です

translation.en: Thanks for joining us. Let's hand off now to Liz at the news desk.
translation.ja: ここからはリズに バトンタッチを

translation.en: All right, thank you, Donna.
Turning now to local news, we're getting reports of surges and power outages all across the county.
translation.ja: 現在 停電や電圧異常が 郡全域で相次いでいます

translation.en: Last night, hundreds of homes in East Hawkins were affected, leaving many residents in the dark.
translation.ja: 昨夜 ホーキンス東部で 数百世帯が停電しました

translation.en: The cause of the outage is still unknown. We reached out to Roane County Water and Electric,
translation.ja: 電気水道局によると 原因は不明ながら―

translation.en: and a spokesperson says that they are confident
translation.ja: 電気水道局によると 原因は不明ながら― 数時間以内に全世帯で 電力復旧の見込みです

translation.en: power will be restored to all remaining homes within the next several hours.
translation.ja: 数時間以内に全世帯で 電力復旧の見込みです
大事なぬいぐるみを 失って嘆いた思い出は？
次に ご紹介するのは…

translation.en: In other news, you might wanna stay home tonight or at least pack an umbrella.
translation.ja: 今夜は傘が要りそうです

translation.en: We turn to everybody's favorite morning weather guy, Charles.
translation.ja: 次は天気予報をどうぞ

translation.en: Where the hell are they?
- Jonathan? - Check the couch!
translation.ja: ジョナサン！ カウチは？

translation.en: Ugh, I did.
Oh... Got them.
Okay, sweetie, I will see you tonight.
translation.ja: 行ってくる　また夜にね

translation.en: - Yeah, see you later. - Where's Will?
Oh, I didn't get him up yet. - He's probably still sleeping. -
- Jonathan, you have to make sure he's up! - Mom, I'm making breakfast.
translation.ja: 起こさなきゃ 料理中だよ

translation.en: I told you this a thousand times.
Will! Come on, honey. It's time to get up.
translation.ja: ウィル　早く起きなさい

translation.en: - He came home last night, right? - He's not in his room?
translation.ja: 昨夜 帰ってきた？ いないの？

translation.en: - Did he come home or not? - I don't know.
translation.ja: 戻ってた？ 知らない

translation.en: - You don't know? - No.
I got home late. I was working.
You were working?
Eric asked if I could cover. I said yeah. I just thought we could use the extra cash.
translation.ja: エリックの代わりさ お金も要るだろ

translation.en: - Jonathan, we've talked about this. - I know, I know.
translation.ja: 決めたはずよ 私の勤務中は居てよね

translation.en: You can't take shifts when I'm working.
translation.ja: 私の勤務中は居てよね

translation.en: Mom, it's not a big deal. Look, he was at the Wheelers' all day.
translation.ja: きっと ウィーラーさんの家さ

translation.en: - I'm sure he just stayed over. - I can't believe you.
translation.ja: きっと ウィーラーさんの家さ 泊まったのさ

translation.en: I can't believe you sometimes.
- - That's disgusting.
- You're disgusting! - Hello?
Hi, Karen. It's Joyce.
translation.ja: カレン　ジョイスよ

translation.en: - Oh, Joyce, hi. - What the hell, Mike?
translation.ja: あら ジョイス 何すんのよ！

translation.en: - Hey! - Quiet! - Language. - Are you kidding?
translation.ja: 静かに！　ごめんさない

translation.en: Was that Will I heard back there?
Will? No, no, no, it's just Mike.
Will didn't spend the night?
No, he left here a little bit after 8:00.
Why? He's not home?
Um, you know what? I think he just left early for... for school.
translation.ja: きっと早めに登校したのね

translation.en: - Thank you so much. Bye. - Okay. Bye.
translation.ja: ありがとう　じゃあ

translation.en: That's weird. I don't see him.
translation.ja: 変だな　ウィルがいない

translation.en: I'm telling you, his mom's right. He probably just went to class early again.
translation.ja: きっと先に教室へ行ったのさ

translation.en: Yeah, he's always paranoid Gursky's gonna give him another pop quiz.
Step right up, ladies and gentlemen.
Step right up and get your tickets for the freak show.
translation.ja: 見世物小屋のオープンだ

translation.en: Who do you think would make more money in a freak show?
Midnight, Frogface, or Toothless?
translation.ja: “闇夜”か？ “カエル顔”か“歯抜け”か？

translation.en: I'd go with Toothless.
I told you a million times, my teeth are coming in. It's called cleidocranial dysplasia.
translation.ja: 遅れて生えてくると言ったろ 鎖骨頭蓋異形成(さこつとうがいいけいせい)症なんだ

translation.en: I told you a million times.
- - Do the arm thing.
Do it, freak!
God, it gets me every time.
- Assholes. - I think it's kinda cool.
translation.ja: ガキめ 超能力っぽくてイカすよ Mr.ファンタスティックだ

translation.en: It's like you have superpowers or something. Like Mr. Fantastic.
translation.ja: 超能力っぽくてイカすよ Mr.ファンタスティックだ

translation.en: Yeah, except I can't fight evil with it.
translation.ja: 悪とは戦えないけどな

translation.en: So, did he call?
Keep your voice down.
Did he?
I told you, it's not like that.
Okay, I mean, yes, he likes me, but not like that.

translation.en: We just...
made out a couple times.
We just... made out a couple times.
translation.ja: “ただ イチャついただけ”

translation.en: Nance, seriously, you're gonna be so cool now, it's ridiculous.

translation.en: No, I'm not.
You better still hang out with me, that's all I'm saying.
If you become friends with Tommy H. or Carol--

translation.en: Oh, that's gross!
Okay, I'm telling you, it was a one- time...
- Two- time thing. -
You were saying?
- Steve... - Mmm- hmm?
- I have to go. - In a minute.
Steve. I really, like...
Seriously, I have to go.
Wait, wait, wait. Let's... Come on, let's do something tonight, yeah?

translation.en: Uh... No, I can't. I have to study for Kaminsky's test.
Oh, come on. What's your GPA again? 3.999...
Kaminsky's tests are impossible.
- Well, then, just let me help. - You failed chem.
- C- minus. - Well, in that case...

translation.en: So I'll be over around, say, like, 8:00?
- Are you crazy? My mom would not-- - I'll climb through your window.
translation.ja: ママが許さない 窓から入る　忍者みたいに

translation.en: She won't even know I'm there. I'm stealthy, like a ninja.
translation.ja: 窓から入る　忍者みたいに

translation.en: You are crazy.
Wait, wait, wait. Just... Okay, forget about that. We can just...

translation.en: We can just, like, chill in my car. We can find a nice quiet place to park, and...

translation.en: Steve... I have to study. I'm not kidding.
translation.ja: スティーブ 私は本当に勉強する気なの

translation.en: Well, why do you think I want it to be nice and quiet?
You're an idiot, Steve Harrington.
translation.ja: バカね スティーブ

translation.en: Meet me at Dearborn and Maple at 8:00.
translation.ja: ディアボーンと メープル通りの角で

translation.en: To study.
Good of you to show.
Oh, hey, morning, Flo. Morning, everybody.
translation.ja: おはよう フローレンス ご苦労 諸君

translation.en: - Hey, Chief. - Damn! You look like hell, Chief.
translation.ja: どうも ひどい顔ですね 署長

translation.en: - Oh, yeah? - Yeah.
Well, I looked better than your wife when I left her this morning.
translation.ja: お前の女房の寝顔よりマシだ

translation.en: While you were drinking or sleeping, or whatever it is you deemed so necessary on Monday morning,
translation.ja: 署長が月曜から 飲酒か朝寝をしてる間に―

translation.ja: ラーソンから 置物の盗難で電話が

translation.en: Oh, those garden gnomes again. Well, I'll tell you what, I'm gonna get right on that.

translation.en: On a more pressing matter, Joyce Byers can't find her son this morning.
translation.ja: それよりも ジョイスの息子が行方不明に

translation.en: Mmm. Okay, I'm gonna get on that.
translation.ja: 対処しよう　一服したらな

translation.en: - Just give me a minute. - Joyce is very upset.

translation.en: Well, Flo, Flo, we've discussed this.
Mornings are for coffee and contemplation.

translation.en: - Chief, she's already in your-- - Coffee and contemplation, Flo!
translation.ja: コーヒーと瞑想の時間なんだ

translation.en: I have been waiting here over an hour, Hopper.
And I apologize again.
I'm going out of my mind!
Look, boy his age, he's probably just playing hookie, okay?

translation.en: No, not my Will. He's not like that.
translation.ja: うちのウィルは違うわ

translation.en: - He wouldn't do that. - Well, you never know.

translation.en: I mean, my mom thought I was on the debate team, when really I was just screwing Chrissy Carpenter

translation.en: in the back of my dad's Oldsmobile, so...

translation.en: Look, he's not like you, Hopper. He's not like me.

translation.en: He's not like... most.

translation.en: They make fun of him. They call him names.
translation.ja: バカにしたり 服装を笑ったり

translation.en: - Does that matter? - Maybe.

translation.en: Lonnie...  Lonnie used to say he was queer.

translation.en: Called him a fag.
- Is he? - He's missing is what he is.

translation.en: When was the last time you heard from Lonnie?
Uh, last I heard, he was in Indianapolis. That was about a year ago.

translation.en: - But he has nothing to do with this. - Why don't you give me his number?

translation.en: You know, Hopper, he has nothing to do with this. Trust me.
Joyce, 99 out of 100 times, kid goes missing, the kid is with a parent or relative.

translation.en: What about the other time?
- What? - You said, 99 out of 100.
- What about the other time, the one? - Joyce. The one!
- Joyce, this is Hawkins, okay? - You wanna know the worst thing that's ever happened here in the four years I've been working here?

translation.en: Do you wanna know the worst thing? It was when an owl attacked Eleanor Gillespie's head because it thought that her hair was a nest.
translation.ja: フクロウが巣と間違えて 女性の頭を襲った事件だぞ

translation.en: Okay, fine. I will call Lonnie. He will talk to me before he talks to--

translation.en: - What, a pig? - A cop!
Just find my son, Hop.
Find him!
Dr. Brenner.
This way, gentlemen.
The entire east wing will be evacuated within the hour.

And the girl?

Yes!

Hello, this is Dustin, and this is the secretary and treasurer of Hawkins Middle AV Club.

translation.en: Do you eat kangaroos for breakfast?
Sorry to interrupt, but, uh, may I borrow Michael, Lucas and Dustin?

translation.en: Okay, okay, okay.

- Well, The Hobbit. - It doesn't matter.

- Shut up, guys! - Hey, hey, hey!
- What'd I just say? - Shut up.
One at a damn time. You.

translation.en: - Yeah, all right, I think I know that-- - We can show you, if you want.
I said that I know it!
- We can help look. - Yeah.

This isn't some Lord of the Rings book.

Thank you, sir.
So, guess what? I got off early and...

I... I thought I wasn't allowed to see it.
I changed my mind.
As long as you don't have nightmares for a week.
No, I won't. I don't get scared like that anymore.

Will! Where are you?

Is that why you ran away?
They, uh...
They hurt you?
You went to the hospital, you got scared, you ran off, you wound up here, is that it?
